Package nl.infcomtec.ollamajava

Class Options

java.lang.Object
nl.infcomtec.ollamajava.Options
public class Options extends Object
Encapsulates various options for adjusting the behavior of the model. These include parameters related to generation such as temperature, token limits, and penalties for repetition.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Boolean
    embeddingOnly
    If true, only initializes model embeddings, significantly reducing memory usage.
    Boolean
    f16Kv
    If true, uses 16-bit floating-point for key/values in self-attention layers, reducing memory usage at a potential cost to accuracy.
    Double
    frequencyPenalty
    Penalty for tokens based on their frequency in the dataset, to reduce common phrases and encourage novel generation.
    Boolean
    logitsAll
    If true, returns logits for all tokens, not just the generated text.
    Boolean
    lowVram
    If true, optimizes processing for systems with low VRAM, potentially reducing the model's memory footprint.
    Integer
    mainGpu
    Designates the main GPU for processing when multiple GPUs are available.
    Integer
    mirostat
    Enables Mirostat sampling to control the model's perplexity, with higher values encouraging more creativity.
    Double
    mirostatEta
    Learning rate for the Mirostat algorithm, controlling how quickly it adjusts based on feedback.
    Double
    mirostatTau
    Adjusts the Mirostat algorithm's tolerance for deviation from the target perplexity.
    Boolean
    numa
    If true, enables Non-Uniform Memory Access optimization for better performance on compatible systems.
    Integer
    numBatch
    Specifies the number of predictions (batches) to generate simultaneously.
    Integer
    numCtx
    Sets the maximum number of tokens the model can use as context when generating a response.
    Integer
    numGpu
    Specifies how many layers of the model should be processed on the GPU.
    Integer
    numGqa
    Number of GQA groups in the transformer layer, required for specific models.
    Integer
    numKeep
    Number of tokens to keep from the input, when generating continuations.
    Integer
    numPredict
    Maximum number of tokens the model is allowed to generate in response to the prompt.
    Integer
    numThread
    Specifies the number of threads the model should use for computation.
    Boolean
    penalizeNewline
    If true, penalizes the generation of new lines, encouraging more compact outputs.
    Double
    presencePenalty
    Penalty applied to tokens generated more frequently in the context, to encourage diversity.
    Integer
    repeatLastN
    Determines how many of the most recent tokens to consider for repetition penalties.
    Double
    repeatPenalty
    Increases the penalty for generating tokens that have been generated recently, to reduce repetition.
    Double
    ropeFrequencyBase
    Base frequency for calculating rope penalties, which can adjust the likelihood of certain tokens based on their frequency.
    Double
    ropeFrequencyScale
    Scale for rope frequency penalties, adjusting the impact of the base frequency on token likelihood.
    Integer
    seed
    Random seed used for generating responses.
    String[]
    stop
    Sequences that, when generated, signal the model to stop generating further tokens.
    Double
    temperature
    Controls the randomness of the generation.
    Double
    tfsZ
    Tail Free Sampling parameter to reduce the likelihood of low probability tokens being chosen.
    Integer
    topK
    Limits the model to considering only the top-k most likely tokens at each step.
    Double
    topP
    At each step of generation, only considers the smallest set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds the threshold p.
    Double
    typicalP
    Adjusts token probabilities to more typical values before sampling.
    Boolean
    useMlock
    If true, locks model weights in memory, preventing them from being swapped to disk.
    Boolean
    useMmap
    If true, uses memory-mapped files for model weights, reducing initial load time at the expense of higher disk IO during generation.
    Boolean
    vocabOnly
    If true, restricts model predictions to tokens found in the vocabulary, potentially improving performance with a slight impact on flexibility.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Field Details

    • numKeep

      public Integer numKeep
      Number of tokens to keep from the input, when generating continuations.

    • seed

      public Integer seed
      Random seed used for generating responses. Setting this value ensures consistent output for identical inputs.

    • numPredict

      public Integer numPredict
      Maximum number of tokens the model is allowed to generate in response to the prompt.

    • topK

      public Integer topK
      Limits the model to considering only the top-k most likely tokens at each step. A lower value increases focus but decreases creativity.

    • topP

      public Double topP
      At each step of generation, only considers the smallest set of tokens whose cumulative probability exceeds the threshold p. Works with top_k to control the randomness and focus of the generation.

    • tfsZ

      public Double tfsZ
      Tail Free Sampling parameter to reduce the likelihood of low probability tokens being chosen. Higher values increase focus on higher probability tokens.

    • typicalP

      public Double typicalP
      Adjusts token probabilities to more typical values before sampling. Higher values can make the model output more predictable.

    • repeatLastN

      public Integer repeatLastN
      Determines how many of the most recent tokens to consider for repetition penalties. Helps to avoid repetitive outputs.

    • temperature

      public Double temperature
      Controls the randomness of the generation. Lower values make the output more deterministic and coherent, while higher values encourage creativity and variability.

    • repeatPenalty

      public Double repeatPenalty
      Increases the penalty for generating tokens that have been generated recently, to reduce repetition.

    • presencePenalty

      public Double presencePenalty
      Penalty applied to tokens generated more frequently in the context, to encourage diversity.

    • frequencyPenalty

      public Double frequencyPenalty
      Penalty for tokens based on their frequency in the dataset, to reduce common phrases and encourage novel generation.

    • mirostat

      public Integer mirostat
      Enables Mirostat sampling to control the model's perplexity, with higher values encouraging more creativity.

    • mirostatTau

      public Double mirostatTau
      Adjusts the Mirostat algorithm's tolerance for deviation from the target perplexity.

    • mirostatEta

      public Double mirostatEta
      Learning rate for the Mirostat algorithm, controlling how quickly it adjusts based on feedback.

    • penalizeNewline

      public Boolean penalizeNewline
      If true, penalizes the generation of new lines, encouraging more compact outputs.

    • stop

      public String[] stop
      Sequences that, when generated, signal the model to stop generating further tokens.

    • numa

      public Boolean numa
      If true, enables Non-Uniform Memory Access optimization for better performance on compatible systems.

    • numCtx

      public Integer numCtx
      Sets the maximum number of tokens the model can use as context when generating a response.

    • numBatch

      public Integer numBatch
      Specifies the number of predictions (batches) to generate simultaneously. Higher values require more computational resources.

    • numGqa

      public Integer numGqa
      Number of GQA groups in the transformer layer, required for specific models.

    • numGpu

      public Integer numGpu
      Specifies how many layers of the model should be processed on the GPU. Can significantly affect performance and resource usage.

    • mainGpu

      public Integer mainGpu
      Designates the main GPU for processing when multiple GPUs are available. Relevant for systems with more than one GPU.

    • lowVram

      public Boolean lowVram
      If true, optimizes processing for systems with low VRAM, potentially reducing the model's memory footprint.

    • f16Kv

      public Boolean f16Kv
      If true, uses 16-bit floating-point for key/values in self-attention layers, reducing memory usage at a potential cost to accuracy.

    • logitsAll

      public Boolean logitsAll
      If true, returns logits for all tokens, not just the generated text. Useful for detailed analysis of model predictions.

    • vocabOnly

      public Boolean vocabOnly
      If true, restricts model predictions to tokens found in the vocabulary, potentially improving performance with a slight impact on flexibility.

    • useMmap

      public Boolean useMmap
      If true, uses memory-mapped files for model weights, reducing initial load time at the expense of higher disk IO during generation.

    • useMlock

      public Boolean useMlock
      If true, locks model weights in memory, preventing them from being swapped to disk. Can improve performance at the cost of increased memory usage.

    • embeddingOnly

      public Boolean embeddingOnly
      If true, only initializes model embeddings, significantly reducing memory usage. Suitable for tasks that only require embedding vectors.

    • ropeFrequencyBase

      public Double ropeFrequencyBase
      Base frequency for calculating rope penalties, which can adjust the likelihood of certain tokens based on their frequency.

    • ropeFrequencyScale

      public Double ropeFrequencyScale
      Scale for rope frequency penalties, adjusting the impact of the base frequency on token likelihood.

    • numThread

      public Integer numThread
      Specifies the number of threads the model should use for computation. Adjusting this can affect performance and CPU usage.

  • Constructor Details

    • Options

      public Options()
